price: These are the verses of Allah; We recite them to you in truth. Allah does not want injustice to the worlds.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَمَا ٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡمٗا لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
